Details

The Gear 360 has evolved to let you record in 4K or broadcast live, and then make it your own with the Samsung Gear 360 app. And with the Gear 360's smaller size and redesigned, easy-to-grip body, memories aren't the only thing you'll want to hold onto.

Features

  • Tell the whole story with the 360° camera that captures every angle in 4K brilliance and share instantly
  • Capture life as it happens in stunning 4K video and 15MP photos thanks to dual 180° lenses
  • Gear 360 is easy to hold and take with you, and has an IP53 water-resistant rating
  • Preview and edit your videos with an easy-to-use app, or share them straight to social or Samsung VR with your Galaxy S8 or S8+
  • Upload your photos or videos to Samsung VR to experience your moments in virtual reality

Specifications

  • Color: White
  • Dimensions: 100.6 x 46.3 x 45.1mm
  • Weight: 130 g
  • Camera: CMOS 8.4MP x2 / F2.2 lens (Default output pixel count - 15MP)
  • Video: 360˚ Dual Lens: up to 4096 x 2048 (24fps)
  • Battery: 1,160mAh
  • External Memory: MicroSD card (up to 256GB)
  • OS Convergence: Android, iOS - Mobile App / Windows, Mac - PC Software
  • Connectivity: Wi-Fi 802.11 (2.4/5GHz), Bluetooth v4.1, USB 2.0 (Type-C)
  • Sensor: Gyro, Accelerometer
